duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead cross-functional teams to think broadly and boldly about the future state and what must be true to enable it.
Design and deliver transformational solutions that can scale across the business leveraging new approaches to people and processes, supported by the best technology.
Work with business unit leaders, technology leaders, and functional teams to design and execute ambitious transformational strategies.
Identify obstacles and roadblocks and proactively develop approaches to overcome them.
Leverage change management best practices to mitigate resistance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience.
Experience in consulting, developing strategy, and/or change management.
Degree in engineering, business (MBA or advanced degree preferred).
